name: Robo-Game
description:
Seki, the robot 

…is a third person shooter where you have to help save a factory from total destruction by the reactor. 

Story: Seki is a hard-working, diligent robot of a work unit in a factory. After an explosion in your assigned factory, you were instructed to take all necessary steps to turn off the power and save the reactor from destruction. Sounds easy at first, but the other robots in your work unit are trying to drain your battery and a lightning bolt is making your robot life difficult.
